name: Development Cycle Meta-Router V1

stages.name: Request Classification
stages.description: Classify user request as bug fix, feature request, refactor, or question

decisions.description: Request is a simple code modification

stages.name: Bug Fix Pipeline
stages.description: Execute bug-fix-v1 pipeline for bug fixes

stages.name: Quick Code Change
stages.description: Handle simple, direct code modifications (1-5 lines)

stages.name: Feature Development Pipeline
stages.description: Execute feature-development-v1 pipeline for new features

stages.name: Handle Question
stages.description: Answer user questions about code or system

connections.description: Bug detected, route to bug-fix pipeline
Simple change requested, use direct code implementer
Feature requested, route to feature-development pipeline
Bug fix pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS
Feature development pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS

userContext: The player is experiencing a critical bug in the first mission where they cannot complete the quest objective 'Craft and Fit an Item'. The player successfully crafts an afterburner and equips it to their ship, but the mission does not recognize completion and remains stuck. Investigate the mission tracking system, specifically how it detects when items are crafted and equipped. Identify why the completion trigger is not firing when the player fits the afterburner. Fix the bug so that crafting and equipping an item properly completes this mission objective.

results.classify_request:
```json
{
  "classification": "BUG_FIX",
  "confidence": 0.98,
  "reasoning": "This is clearly a bug fix request. The user explicitly states 'critical bug' and describes a broken game mechanic where the mission objective does not complete despite the player performing the required actions (crafting and equipping an afterburner). The mission tracking system is failing to recognize completion, which is a functional defect that needs repair. Key indicators include: 'cannot complete', 'does not recognize completion', 'remains stuck', 'completion trigger is not firing', and the explicit instruction to 'Fix the bug'.",
  "context": {
    "originalRequest": "The player is experiencing a critical bug in the first mission where they cannot complete the quest objective 'Craft and Fit an Item'. The player successfully crafts an afterburner and equips it to their ship, but the mission does not recognize completion and remains stuck. Investigate the mission tracking system, specifically how it detects when items are crafted and equipped. Identify why the completion trigger is not firing when the player fits the afterburner. Fix the bug so that crafting and equipping an item properly completes this mission objective.",
    "keyIndicators": [
      "critical bug",
      "cannot complete",
      "does not recognize completion",
      "remains stuck",
      "completion trigger is not firing",
      "Fix the bug"
    ],
    "affectedArea": "Mission system, quest tracking, crafting system, ship fitting system",
    "priority": "high",
    "specificIssue": "Mission objective 'Craft and Fit an Item' not completing when player crafts afterburner and equips it",
    "systemsInvolved": [
      "Mission tracking/quest system",
      "Crafting system event detection",
      "Ship fitting system event detection",
      "Objective completion triggers"
    ]
  }
}
```

DECISION: BUG_FIX
